thread.title: Brian
thread.title_full: Pure Diesel Power reviewed by Brian

author: Brian
title: Brian
text: After searching for an inexpensive OEM fuel filter. I went to the local Auto parts store. The clerk pulled up your page and showed me the upgrade conversion kit. I was surprised to see how affordable it was compared to all the aftermarket filters I was looking at. Great job to Merles automotive and Pure Diesel.
